t_citizen_journalist_2_traffic_accident:: Show a detail of the accident, broken glass, a torn door, etc.
See a Traffic Accident? Report it!
Show the action happening around the accident.
Next interview those nearby. Be sure you, and the people around you, are safe before you start this section of your story.
Show someone responding to the accident.
Duplicate the cards above and interview as many people as you need. Try to speak with a witness or someone from emergency services.
Shoot more clips as needed. When you are finished, arrange your clips below with the Order button, and click Publish to upload.
Ask- How you see the accident? How did it happen?
Show the place the accident happened.
Show a close up detail of the accident, broken glass, a torn door, some result of the accident.
